body.name: WLIVE Fabric Dresser for Bedroom - Storage Drawer Unit as TV Stand for 32-43 inch TVs - Wide Dresser with 8 Large Deep Drawers for Office, College Dorm, Rustic Brown

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Multifunction Dresser: This wide dresser is perfect for bedroom, closet, living room, hallway, dorm and office, and matches perfectly with other WLIVE fabric dressers.
For All Storage Needs: With 8 large deep drawers, the dresser for bedroom provides endless organizational possibilities and can help you keep your home clear of clutter.
Exquisite Design: Wood top can place things you want to display or keep within reach. The bedroom dresser can also hold small-size TV. It can be a dresser TV stand for 32", 40", or 43" TV.
Practical and Durable: Selected materials ensure years of use of the dresser; Easy-to-pull handles help open and close the drawers smoothly; 4 adjustable feet can protect your floor from scratches.
Overall Dimension: The wide chest of drawers measures 39.4" L x 11.8" W x 31.3" H. With detailed instructions and all hardware provided, the storage drawer unit is easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for inexpensive storage
reviews.reviewText: This is the second time I have purchased a fabric dresser from this company. I was so impressed with my previous product I decided to get more for a recent bedroom redo for my 9 year old granddaughters birthday. Her bedroom is not large so this particular piece works great as her dresser. The dimensions are 11.8Dx39.4Wx31.3H with 8 storage cubbies. You can get a lot more than you think in these "drawers". She is old enough to know not to pull the containers all the way forward as there are no stops and they come all the way out. The depth of the unit is what we were looking for as traditional dressers are too deep for her room size. We also did not want to spend a lot of money on traditional furniture . We wall mounted her tv above the dresser with enough space that her Nintendo Switch fits nicely on the top. Personally I would not put anything too heavy on this especially in a kids room. Unit is pretty easy to assemble but time consuming. We had all the parts and no damage. I really like this furniture and if you buy it knowing what it is I do not think you will be disappointed. Good value, looks nice and lots of storage. We also got the 2 drawer nightstand but was too short to use beside her bed so using as extra storage for her games beside the dresser. Ordered a 3 drawer nightstand from a different brand .. Somdot Small Dresser ... and it is not near the quality as WLIVE. unfortunately WLIVE did not have a comparable nightstand. Would not recommend Somdot fabric furniture...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together it’s a lot of clothes. Nice, looking sturdy. Absolutely love it. Bought two more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, looks cheap from the side
reviews.reviewText: Assembly was easy and it holds up well to the clothes. The only downside of the fabric drawers is if you fill them when they aren’t in the dresser they flex out and you have to wrangle them into the slot. This is avoided by filling them while still in place. It looks good from the front but definitely should be kept in a corner so you can’t see the gray sides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Small Spaces and Good for Some People with Specific Handicaps
reviews.reviewText: I bought this dresser after reading a multitude of reviews (both good and bad, however there were clearly more good than bad). I was very clear on what I was looking for - I'm female with an older brother who has Parkinson's disease and I wanted - or rather needed something I could move around by myself, put together by myself, and yet something my brother could work and utilize by himself. Traditional wooden dressers are difficult for someone with Parkinson's - the drawers are just too heavy for him to pull out and push back in. Additionally, he lives in a retirement/assisted living community and has a rather small bedroom, so we needed something that would fit. I was attracted to the light weight, the fabric drawers, the overall size (there are so many to choose from) but more importantly - the top was made of wood so he could still utilize it as traditional dressers might be. It came quickly, packaging was fine, instructions were pretty good - although, pay attention when they talk about big holes and small holes facing upward - be sure to look closely at the pictures and remember they are referring to the center holes on the bars (I don't know why they don't just say that's the hole they are referring to); I could have used a rubber mallet to push in some of the final pieces, but I ended up just using a set of pliers as a hammer (plastic pieces to fill in the empty holes for looks). I believe they do mention having a hammer available in the instructions - so, my bad. Other than that, the only "problem" was a single drawer frame that was slightly bent and I could not bend it back into shape - however, it did nothing to hinder putting it together or impair the use of the drawer in any way. My brother absolutely loves the dresser and I am so happy to come into his bedroom and see that he actually uses it - all drawers are completely filled and pushed in all the way. It's been great! Highly recommend if you have specifics like I did in mind for its use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little dresser
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and great price. Suits my needs and works great. No odor, all drawers line up fine!! No issues with needing two ppl to put together but I have had my share of building furniture. This was great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought it to use as a TV stand but the storage is a great extra feature. It looks very good in the bedroom. Sturdy and easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product was damaged
reviews.reviewText: I don't know if it was during shipping or packaging but I'm super annoyed I was excited to get it and now it's gonna be a pain to try and return it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap but sufficiently durable
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to assemble, and has held up well. I needed a dresser temporarily but didn't want to waste a bunch of money on a nice one. This was well worth the price I paid and looks good enough that I am in no rush to replace it.
